Line3.135F47: Unlike that weak-hearted brother of mine, I have no qualms with using it to gain some gold by stalling their symptoms. Even if they will carry the taint of it forever, what do I care? Everyone dies eventually.
Line1.135F47: Hiding amongst these heretics is a necessity, now that I've been chased off from Wejinhani by those nosy Elders. Once I'm back on my feet, I'll head to Zarbinzet and start things all over again.
